German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Vormittag
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

vor- +‎ Mittag

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈfoːɐ̯.mɪˌtaːk/ (standard)
  • IPA(key): /ˈfɔɐ̯.mɪˌtax/ (northern and central Germany; chiefly colloquial)
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Vormittag m (genitive Vormittags or Vormittages, plural Vormittage)

  1. mid-morning, late morning, forenoon (time of day roughly between 9 a.m. and noon)
Declension[edit]
Declension of Vormittag

genitiveeinesdesVormittages,
Vormittags		derVormittage

Vormittage1		denVormittagen
accusativeeinendenVormittagdieVormittage
1Now uncommon, see notes

Synonyms[edit]

  • Morgen (more general)
